page.title: 03EDUCATION - PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: We learn many subjects at our school. They are English, maths, reading, French, computer work, art and crafts, music and social studies. The clubs we have are chess, cricket, badminton, short tennis, hockey, football and the book club. We are able to use the Sports Centre for some of our activities. South Cave is mainly a farming area and the children come to school by bus, taxi, car or walking. Once a week Mr. Shimwell, our vicar comes to school to take our assembly. Every week each class takes it in turn to do a play for our religious education. Most children stay at school for a school dinner or a packed lunch.
